channel.title: Yell command members only?
channel.description:
Is is posible to make the yell command members only so that syi's cant come on and abuse it and so people who enjoy my server can still do it?
Greatly appreasiated
Jonny Owner of Jonnyscape

item.title: Yell command members only?
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

ye it is posible 1 sec let me find it for you.

Ok well here is a basic yell command:

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }
    }[/code]

Try to add this in there somehow:

if(playerIsMember == 1)

That should make it work. If you have any questions please ask.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command members only?
item.dc:creator: @games4pros games4pros
item.description:
@games4pros wrote:

It should be soething like:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerMember => 1) { String text = command.substring(8); yell(+playername": "+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

something like that, except it depends on your server configuration. somethings need to be changed such as the ones written in blue. a few other ones might also be a factor.

Read full topic
